column1: S0204.CARD.  1. CARD ONE
S0204.DECK.  204. SURVEY NUMBER
S0204.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.

S0204.Q1. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOOL?  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER

S0204.Q2. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THIS REINFORCEMENT DEPOT?  01. 1-7 DAYS 02. 8-14 DAYS 03. 15-21 DAYS 04. 22-28 DAYS 05. 29-35 DAYS 06. 36-42 DAYS 07. 43-49 DAYS 08. 50-56 DAYS 09. 57-90 DAYS 10. 91-180 DAYS 11. OVER 180 DAYS 00. NO ANSWER

S0204.Q3. HOW MANY REINFORCEMENT DEPOTS HAVE YOU BEEN IN SINCE YOU GOT OUT OF THE HOSPITAL?  01. ONLY THIS ONE 02. ONE BESIDES THIS ONE 03. TWO BESIDES THIS ONE 04. THREE BESIDES THIS ONE 05. MORE THAN THREE BESIDES THIS ONE 06. 4 07. 5 08. 6 09. 7 10. 8 11. 9 00. NO ANSWER

S0204.Q4. WHEN DID YOU LAST LEAVE THE HOSPITAL?  01. FEBRUARY 1945 02. JANUARY 1945 03. DECEMBER 1944 04. NOVEMBER 1944 05. OCTOBER 1944 06. SEPTEMBER 1944 07. AUGUST 1944 08. JULY 1944 09. JUNE 1944 10. BEFORE JUNE 1944 11. NEVER OR NONE 00. NO ANSWER

S0204.Q5. WHEN DID YOU LAST LEAVE YOUR OLD OUTFIT?  01. FEBRUARY 1945 02. JANUARY 1945 03. DECEMBER 1944 04. NOVEMBER 1944 05. OCTOBER 1944 06. SEPTEMBER 1944 07. AUGUST 1944 08. JULY 1944 09. JUNE 1944 10. BEFORE JUNE 1944 11. NEVER OR NONE 00. NO ANSWER
S0204.Q6. ARE YOU GENERAL SERVICE OR LIMITED ASSIGNMENT?  1. GENERAL SERVICE 2. LIMITED ASSIGNMENT 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0204.Q7. IF YOU ARE LIMITED ASSIGNMENT, WHAT CLASS ARE YOU IN?  1. LIMITED ASSIGNMENT CLASS 2 (LA-2) 2. LIMITED ASSIGNMENT CLASS 3 (LA-3) 3. LIMITED ASSIGNMENT CLASS 4 (LA-4) 4. LIMITED ASSIGNMENT CLASS 5 (LA-5) 5. DON'T KNOW WHAT CLASS I AM IN 6. NO ANSWER

S0204.Q8. FOR MEN IN YOUR CLASS OF LIMITED ASSIGNMENT, HOW LONG IS IT FROM THE TIME THEY ARE PUT ON LIMITED ASSIGNMENT BEFORE THEY ARE EXAMINED AGAIN BY A MEDICAL BOARD?  1. 3 TO 6 MONTHS 2. 6 MONTHS TO 1 YEAR 3. 1 TO 2 YEARS 4. IN MY CLASS THEY ARE NOT EXAMINED AGAIN 5. DON'T KNOW HOW LONG IT IS 0. NO ANSWER
S0204.Q9. WHAT WAS THE REASON WHY YOU WERE PUT ON LIMITED ASSIGNMENT?  1. WOUNDED 2. COMBAT EXHAUSTION 3. TRENCH FOOT 4. OTHER NON-BATTLE INJURY 5. SOME OTHER REASON 0. NO ANSWER
S0204.Q10. SINCE YOU HAVE BEEN AT THIS REINFORCEMENT DEPOT HAVE YOU BEEN INTERVIEWED BY ANYONE ABOUT THE KIND OF ARMY JOB YOU MIGHT DO HERE IN THE ETO?  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER

S0204.Q11. DO YOU THINK THAT MOST LIMITED ASSIGNMENT REINFORCEMENTS ARE ASSIGNED TO AN ARMY JOB FOR WHICH THEY ARE WELL SUITED?  1. ALMOST ALL OF THEM ARE 2. MOST OF THEM ARE 3. ALMOST HALF OF THEM ARE 4. MOST OF THEM ARE NOT 5. ALMOST ALL OF THEM ARE NOT 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 12 NOT CODED.

S0204.Q13. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOU HAVE BEEN TOLD AS MUCH AS IT IS POSSIBLE TO TELL YOU ABOUT WHAT TYPE OF JOB YOU ARE GOING TO BE ASSIGNED TO?  1. YES, THEY HAVE TOLD US ABOUT AS MUCH AS THEY CAN 2. NO, THEY COULD HAVE TOLD US A LOT MORE 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0204.Q14. DO YOU THINK IT IS NECESSARY TO PUT LIMITED ASSIGNMENT MEN IN REAR ECHELON JOBS IN THE ETO OR SHOULD THEY BE SENT BACK TO THE U.S.*  1. IT IS NECESSARY TO PUT THEM ON JOBS HERE 2. THEY SHOULD BE SENT BACK TO THE U.S. 0. NO ANSWER

S0204.Q15. IN GENERAL, DO YOU THINK THE ARMY HAS TRIED ITS BEST TO SEE THAT MEN GET AS SQUARE DEAL AS POSSIBLE?  1. YES, IT HAS TRIED ITS BEST 2. IT HAS TRIED SOME BUT NOT HARD ENOUGH 3. IT HAS HARDLY TRIED AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S0204.Q16. IN GENERAL, DO YOU THINK THAT YOU YOURSELF HAVE GOTTEN A SQUARE DEAL FROM THE ARMY?  1. YES, IN MOST WAYS I HAVE 2. IN SOME WAYS, YES, IN OTHER WAYS, NO 3. NO, ON THE WHOLE I HAVE NOT GOTTEN A SQUARE DEAL 0. NO ANSWER
S0204.Q17. DO YOU EVER GET THE FEELING THAT THIS WAR IS NOT WORTH FIGHTING?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ONLY ONCE IN A GREAT WHILE 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER

S0204.Q18. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE WAY THE CADRE IS TREATED HERE AS COMPARED WITH THE WAY THE CASUAL MEN IN THE COMPANY ARE TREATED?  1. THE CADRE ARE TREATED QUITE A BIT BETTER 2. THE CADRE ARE TREATED A LITTLE BETTER 3. THEY ARE ALL TREATED ABOUT THE SAME 4. THE CASUALS ARE TREATED A LITTLE BETTER THAN THE CADRE 5. THE CASUALS ARE TREATED QUITE A BIT BETTER THAN THE CADRE 0. NO ANSWER

S0204.Q19. WHEN WAS THE LAST TIME YOU RECEIVED AT LEAST A FULL MONTH'S PAY?  01. FEBRUARY 1945 02. JANUARY 1945 03. DECEMBER 1944 04. NOVEMBER 1944 05. OCTOBER 1944 06. SEPTEMBER 1944 07. AUGUST 1944 08. JULY 1944 09. JUNE 1944 10. BEFORE JUNE 1944 11. NEVER OR NONE 00. NO ANSWER

S0204.Q20. WHEN WAS THE LAST TIME YOU RECEIVED A PARTIAL PAYMENT?  01. FEBRUARY 1945 02. JANUARY 1945 03. DECEMBER 1944 04. NOVEMBER 1944 05. OCTOBER 1944 06. SEPTEMBER 1944 07. AUGUST 1944 08. JULY 1944 09. JUNE 1944 10. BEFORE JUNE 1944 11. NEVER OR NONE 00. NO ANSWER

S0204.Q21. ARE YOUR MESS FACILITIES AND FOOD ABOUT AS GOOD AS THEY COULD BE UNDER PRESENT CIRCUMSTANCES?  1. ABOUT AS GOOD AS THEY COULD BE 2. COULD BE A BIT BETTER 3. COULD BE A LOT BETTER 0. NO ANSWER

S0204.Q22. ARE YOUR HOUSING AND SANITARY CONDITIONS ABOUT AS GOOD AS THEY COULD BE UNDER PRESENT CIRCUMSTANCES?  1. ABOUT AS GOOD AS THEY COULD BE 2. COULD BE A BIT BETTER 3. COULD BE A LOT BETTER 0. NO ANSWER

S0204.Q23. ARE YOU GETTING ABOUT AS MUCH TIME OFF (FURLOUGH AND PASSES) AS YOU SHOULD HAVE UNDER PRESENT CIRCUMSTANCES?  1. ABOUT AS MUCH AS WE SHOULD HAVE 2. SHOULD HAVE A BIT MORE 3. SHOULD HAVE A LOT MORE 0. NO ANSWER

S0204.Q24. IS THE TRANSPORTATION PROVIDED FROM YOUR CAMP TO TOWN ABOUT AS GOOD AS IT COULD BE UNDER PRESENT CIRCUMSTANCES?  1. ABOUT AS GOOD AS COULD BE 2. COULD BE A BIT BETTER 3. COULD BE A LOT BETTER 0. NO ANSWER

S0204.Q25. ARE YOUR RECREATION AND ENTERTAINMENT NEEDS ABOUT AS WELL TAKEN CARE OF AS THEY COULD BE UNDER PRESENT CIRCUMSTANCES?  1. ABOUT AS GOOD AS THEY COULD BE 2. COULD BE A BIT BETTER 3. COULD BE A LOT BETTER 0. NO ANSWER
S0204.Q26. IF YOU HAVE ANY COMMENTS OR SUGGESTIONS ON THE WAY LIMITED ASSIGNMENT MEN SHOULD BE HANDLED, WRITE THEM HERE:  1. COMMENT 2. NO COMMENT
